website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced bladeless fan that doesn't take up too much space and has lots of user-friendly features. Works well in most situations, unless you have a very large room to cool.
pros: Has a small design that's suitable for small to medium rooms, and oscillates and tilts to spread air where needed
Energy-efficient to operate, and has a remote and timer
cons: May not work well for very spacious areas
Some reports of malfunctions after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: No air, just sits there and groans like a constipated R2D2
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure it should be easy to figure out how to work a fan.....but all it does is make a groaning R2D2 noise and does not blow any air. Can't return it through Amazon, have to return through the company. UPDATE- Trying to return this has been difficult, won't ship a new one until they receive the broken one, I needed it to take out of town and the replacement won't be here in time. Can I do a "minus star"?
customer_reviews.author: Airehead

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet humming sound. I am a light sleeper. Any noise keeps me awake. This fan on #1 setting to keep the air circulated in my room doesnt bother me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Off-gassing chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I gave this fan as a gift and am greatly embarrassed. It off-gassed a chemical smell which, after a few hours, was still evident causing both headache and nausea. Calling Green Tech support was a joke, with the automatic answering algorithm requiring answering questions like giving ones age, and forcing listening to ads for vacations, long wait times and such. No recourse or advice was available from GrennTech customer service. So back the fan went causing my gift to be a big pain for the person I gave it to. Would NEVER buy from Green Tech again. Amazon, however, returned purchase price immediately. Thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: AGS

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This fan was great while it worked, but stopped working all of a sudden. It appears to have a short in the cord that I cannot fix myself. Really disappointed due to the price point of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FAN!  QUIET & VERSATILE
customer_reviews.text: This fan is AMAZINGLY quiet. It rotates (up or down) 90 degrees and also oscillates 90 degrees, meaning you can have it blow it any direction you want (toward the floor, toward the ceiling, all around the room, etc). Love that i'ts bladeless and easy to clean. Remote is handy also. With the 12 settings, you can have a slight breeze on the lowest, and level 12 gives off a nice blast of air. I'm so glad I tried this fan. LOVE IT. I plan on buying a second one for our cabin. It does a great job of moving air around and it's extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t oscillate
customer_reviews.text: Got it out of the box and fan does not oscillate, either by button on fan or remote. Does beep though. Tried calling help line at 800 621-2701 and all you get is a “Survey” that tries to seek you a cruise or health monitor etc. you can go no further Thant the “Survey” I have tried emailing, let’s see what happens, will update when I find out
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blade-less fan - so small and works really well. The oscillating and tilting features are really helpful to direct it where you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Maurine

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan, I really really like it. Very quiet, safe for kids hands, and the adjustable angles are exactly what we needed in the nursery. The only reason it's not 5-stars is that I've only had it for a few weeks and there's already a faint clicking when oscillating. It's nowhere near as bad as cheaper fans, and if I turn it off or move it around a bit and turn back on it usually goes away.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: After a week the highest setting (12) was acting weird and changing from low to high speed on its own, so I moved to 11 which worked for a few more weeks until now the fan stopped working all together. Also, it's not as powerful or quiet as the description portrays it to be.
customer_reviews.author: nodesoftheheart

customer_reviews.title: Quiet! Quiet! Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a little on the expensive side, however it has everything I was looking for. We live in our 5th wheel and have little room. Our bedroom gets very stuffy especially when I do the laundry. I have this sitting on our dresser and this little fan comes to our rescue the second we turn it on. turn it on high for 15seconds and our room is wonderful and no noise, then I turn it on low and the air in our room is wonderful for sleeping. This is a must have fan. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Power cuts off when oscillation is on, cannot return item
customer_reviews.text: I liked this fan a lot. It is quiet, small, and very effective. It is expensive but seemed worth it for the quiet factor and energy efficiency. The problem I have now is that the power will cut off when you turn on oscillation. The removable power cable does not seem to be loose, b/c you can power it back on without any adjustment. For the price, I expected this to last for many years. I bought it in June 2018 and my return window closed in July. The support window closed in September. I want this fan to work and I'm disappointed I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great fan with 1 or 2 downsides
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: Is a decent blade less fan, a fair bit loud one at that. I have my fan atop my desk and it works well but at a price. I game with friends online and we use voice chat software to communicate. ( I.e discord ) If you set it the fan speed to anything above 3 or 4 - and it can go all they way up to setting 12 - the people on the other side of the call can hear it pretty well. Setting 12 is basically a jet engine... Also, the fan is MUCH bigger than it seems in pictures. It’s a nice fan, I just have personal critiques about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Love the bladeless design. The best part is how quiet it is. On the first few settings you can barely hear it...a must for a light sleeper like me. Also, don’t let the design fool you. Although it kind of looks like a table fan, you can put it on the fool and it cools the whole room. Yes, it’s a little more $$ than some of the tower fans, but in my opinion, the quality and technology are much better. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RobGP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fan! It puts out far more air than my Dyson ever did, and quietly! I don’t mind fan noise at night. I actually enjoy it for white noise. But this is in my living room and will help keep my electric bill down!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, uncomplicated fan...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this fan for about a week, so we're not seasoned users. HOWEVER.... it can move air efficiently and quietly. Now, if turned on to HIGH, it is less quiet, but if you're not clearing a room of smoke or foul odors, I doubt one w/need the higher settings. We use ours at night to create gentle air movement in the bedroom, and it performs SO well. When my budget allows, I'll be purchasing one more for the other end of our home. This is an excellent product! THANK YOU! P.S. We really like the convenience of the remote... :`>
customer_reviews.author: S. Chance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan.
customer_reviews.text: So quiet yet powerful. We bought these for the bedroom and they are almost silent on the 1 -3 settings. The fan is bigger than I thought it wuld be and it’s not streamlined and beautiful ut as a fan, it is perfect. I’d recommend this fan to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Terry McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Warning Quit working after 10 Days...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan when it works. We placed this in the bedroom, only turned it on in the evening. Ten days later it turned on, then quit after 10 minutes. Turned it back on and it quit, completely, no power light NOTHING. Now we have to go through the hassle of return/refund. Great concept...VERY POOR QUALITY...!!!
customer_reviews.author: jkerf

customer_reviews.title: Review update July 6,2018
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I love this fan !!A little pricey but "well worth the money ." Small and compact little wind blower that is so quiet. Now I will admit if you go above 5, you will hear more but even that is significantly less compared to the other 3 monsters 👾that I have😜. Warranty is a winner but hopefully I will never have to put it to a test. Going to order a second one because I drag the one I have between rooms...lol. I love giving a good review but trust this ol lady...if something is bad, I take them down !! O I forgot...it has a remote control and oscillates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted from July 3rd 2018 and Died September 17th, 2018.  Thats fifty dollars a month.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan on July 1, 2018 and received it on July 3rd. I used it in my bedroom and living in Florida needed it to run continuously. Today is September 17th and the fan quit working. First it would run for about 15 minutes and then turn off, then 10 minutes and then I couldn’t turn it on at all. I have a round fan that is two months old, cost 99.00 and is a piece of crap. The blue light that was always on was a problem in the bedroom at night for someone like myself that is a light sleeper. Back to the drawing board but not with one of these fans.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Amundson

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Fan (with reservations) of this Fan
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, quiet fan, much easier to clean than a typical bladed fan, but crazily, it starts to oscillate when I mute my TV, though the television is more than 7 feet away across the room (and the TV remote even further). Possibly related, the remote for the fan didn't work--I called the company, which promised a replacement, though it's now been more than two weeks. I also hope that someday the fan will come in colors other than white.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Stopped working less than 2 months after the warranty gave out. I would turn it on, then it would shut itself off after about 30 seconds of use. Major defect somewhere in the electronics. Tried to use the Asurion protection plan I purchased for the fan....and my claim was denied. A vague answer was given as to why they would not cover the claim. That was an extra $15.00 poorly spent on that crappy Asurion (Not Really) Protection Plan. The $100 for my now worthless fan and $15 for the useless protection plan would have been better spent on a Dyson. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kwajshell

customer_reviews.title: it helps to keep things cool (even during heat waves)
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write product reviews, but sincerely thank all those who do as I greatly rely on them when choosing products. I've had this handy little fan for just over a month and it definitely delivers. It makes a noticeable difference in the temperature, so much that I'm planning to purchase two additional ones, one for us to keep around, and another for my business to help boost the AC. In short, it helps to keep things cool (even during heat waves), is quiet, and efficient. And not too bad to look at, or too clunky. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gudbjorg Arnalds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office!!! It has a very good airflow. My office has the tenancy to get extremely hot, and this helps me keep it cooled off at work. I keep it oscillating on my shelf in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace a non-working ceiling fan in master bedroom. Works better than the ceiling fan ever did. Our toddlers often stick their hands in and around it (despite our instructions not to) and we don’t have to worry. One of our toddlers jammed the remote in a window sill and closed it - I tried fixing and replacing the battery but didn’t work. Contacted the seller to see if we could purchase a replacement remote. They responded right away on a weekend and sent me a new remote within 48 hours, free of charge, and said, “Glad you’re enjoying your fan.” Will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great as described but the beeping sound it makes every time you press a button (speed up/down, oscillate, on/off) makes my dog want to jump out the window in agony. The beep is similar to that of a smoke detector and has the same effect on my dog. If there was a way to disable the beep I would keep it. Unfortunately, its being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It's perfect and exactly what I wanted. I havent found a single issue except an annoyance. My DirecTV remote, my surround sound remote and my LG remote all make this thing beep. It only adjusts the timer on it. It drives me crazy. Can anyone tell me why? It doesnt make it any less of a nice fan, its quiet and even on the highest speed (12) it's not overwhelming or loud. It does sometimes make a noise when oscillating, but it doesnt hinder its movement. My biggest argument about other fans is the restraint you have with them. It makes the room comfortable and moves the hot and cold spots around nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Best fan ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one a couple years ago for the bedroom. It does a great job of quietly moving air & have actually come to enjoy the soft sound it makes when running. Like it so much I bought a second one for using on hot summer days. It’s become my portable fan for different rooms & guest bedroom when we have company. It has a great range of motion if wanted & a great range of speeds when needed. Only thing I dislike is the really loud & annoying beep when turning on/off/changing speeds/rotation. If they fixed that, then this fan would be perfect! We tolerate the sound because this fan is otherwise really, really great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Normal Noise Level. Not Especially Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This fan replaced a small Vornado fan on my boat at more than twice the cost. Noise level is the same. 3 stars as this fan is no where near as quite as promoted. On low it is very quiet, but so are all quality fans. The timer, oscillate function, and remote are nice options. Good fan but IMO, overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Captain TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bladeless fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan turned out to be a good purchase. It was much less expensive than the dyson bladeless, had more speed controls, and came with 2 remotes. I can use the remote to change settings or just change them on the fan itself. It is also quieter. Would definitely recommend this over the Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: CAC/Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this $99 fan and after 7 months it stopped working. I sent them an e-mail and, at first, the representative was very responsive. Since it was under warranty, they wanted me to send it back. Because of it's design, it is heavy and would have cost me another $27 to mail back. I asked them to send me a prepaid mailing label since I had already invested money in the fan, and got no response to repeated requests. Keep this in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: NAME:  Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find anything wrong with this fan. On low it is quiet enough to sleep with not too much air to give me a cold. When the speed is at the top of the power this fan really moves some air. The only sound is that of the air moving, no fan motor or blade racket at all. The remote works fine and the oscillation is just right. Very glad that I wasn't intimidated by the price. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan to use with my hydroponic gardens as lettuce needs wind movement to crisp the leaves. This is perfect as it is totally adjustable with a wide range of speed control, oscillation and can be tilted for direction control. The most important thing is that it is super quiet!
customer_reviews.author: SAMAB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little fan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little fan. It looks a bit like a left over from Space Odyssey, but can easily fit in any decor. When it is on low, (1-3), It is so quiet, you almost forget it is there. There are 12 speeds and as you get to the higher speeds, the noise level is no different from any other fan. It is perfect for me because the direct cooling air of 1 or 2 is perfect for television watching. I would give it 5 stars, but was exoecting an absolutely quiet fan as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Novak

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it..........
customer_reviews.text: What I like about, it looks difference. What I don't like about it , well I was better of buying a regular fan. I had this ball fan set on 12 in my 350 sq. Ft. Travel trailer and I barely FELT the air. So for that I give it two thumbs down and one star. NOT WORTH $100. Maybe $40 ( @that ).
customer_reviews.author: APENIMON

customer_reviews.title: Space fan.
customer_reviews.text: The thing looks like some sort of spacecraft. As advertised, it is fairly quiet at lower settings. When you get above fan setting 4, you can really hear this thing. At fan setting 12, it can be heard from quite a distance. The airflow up to setting 4 is basically a breeze. Setting 12 is pretty powerful The remote is a fairly cheap piece of work. Very generic. Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival - company needs to make this right
customer_reviews.text: I am deployed and was looking forward to having a fan that works. After 3 weeks of waiting, I finally received it. When I went to plug everything in and turn it on, there was a loud rattling noise on the inside. Don’t know what it is but I can’t use it. Disappointed with the product. Unfortunately I am unable to return it ATM due to COVID and our mailroom not accepting packages to be sent out. I will adjust my rating if the company reaches out.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: remote - low speed fan setting so can be fairly quiet - oscillates - a no brainer.....
customer_reviews.text: so it's $90 instead of the usual $40 but its 20 times better for the price - has a remote so that's really nice - can run at a very low and quiet speed so that's even nicer - oscillates also - has a sleep timer - remote comes with a battery of course so all I have to say is give it a try for a bedroom if you are noise sensitive - dial in just the right amount of white noise if that's what you also need.........
customer_reviews.author: P. Wylde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have this fan set to blow over me at night on the lowest speed. The airflow is sufficient and it is extremely quiet. The slight noise I can hear as I fall asleep is a nice register to me, probably the best white noise I've ever had. Cranked up to the max, the fan starts to get loud, but it moves a lot of air. I almost never need to use it above 50% though. The only complaint I had was the beep whenever you change the fan speed, so I opened it up and disabled the piezo buzzer myself. Now it's perfect :D
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Real quiet on the low speeds and not bad when on 12. The rotation is nice . Bought it to move the warm air around in winter and then to move the air around in the hot weather. Remote control works great. It is bigger than i thought but it is a good looking fan. I will update review after we have had it for a few months. Nice long adapter cord with it also.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dubois

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this fan sooner! It's quiet, easy to set up, and you can really feel the air moving through the room as it oscillates, especially on a hot and stuffy summer day. It's also easy to clean by just wiping it down with a cloth; no disassembly required! Opening the battery slot in the back of the remote was a little tricky though because of the very small release notch.
customer_reviews.author: Eva B

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: No!!!! This fan is not quiet!!!!! If its on 1 which blows so little air u cant feel it its quiet ]but other than that NOT QUIET!!!! soooo frustrating!!!! It actually hurts ur ears!!! Oh! And remote doesn't work and it order to change the speed down u have to go thru all the speeds so if u have it on 2 and want it back on 1 u have to got 3-12 ti get it bk to 1 ...so dumb!!!! HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Gift Received Well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister who is constantly complaining of being too hot at night. She calls it her eye in the sky because of the way it looks on the shelf in her room. It is quiet. She usually uses it at a medium level and has minimal noise. She hasn't had to clean it yet. She did turn it up to high when she first got it, and it wasn't any more loud than a regular fan, maybe a little quieter. Overall she is very happy with it. The real test will come when it gets really hot again at night. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly quieter than a cheap box fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an extremely quiet fan. I used a decibel meter to compare the QT7 with a cheap box fan, and the QT7 is only about 5 decibels quieter. And the QT7 is about 10 decibels louder than a small, cheap tower fan. If you want the quietest fan possible, you'll get better results (and spend less money) with a small tower fan.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woinoski

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: We travel full-time in our motorcoach (RV) and have purchased another product from GreenTech before (PureAire). We have been so impressed with that product, that we have purchased other units for friends as gifts. When we decided against a ceiling fan for the bedroom, we started looking for a portable fan to meet our needs. My thought process immediately went to GreenTech. We are so glad we did! The PureFlow fan is an amazing product. Quiet operation, nice air movement, easily located to meet our needs and the design appearance is not the typical boxy looking fan. Would recommend purchase of this product. Keep up the innovations GreenTech!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bussen

customer_reviews.title: I’m buying another one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve own this fan for a year and just came back to purchase another one for my family room. The things I like about the fan are: Its quiet It does not create buffeting air like blades fans The remote works great There are 12 different speeds It has stood up to the test of time Less expensive option than Dyson but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan kicks ass! Don't be fooled by the design, it's actually a pretty cool concept. Fan speeds are nice, with 12 highest but 6 is enough for my son's room. Haven't had the chance to clean yet. Tilting feature is awesome, so you don't have to put on table.
customer_reviews.author: Angela DLC

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is worth your $. I'm very sensitive to noise and this is the most quiet fan we have ever bought. It delivers nice cool air and at its lowest setting you barely hear it at all. I love that it doesn't have blades to clean, and the remote is a nice feature. The remote is a bit hard to read - so not a great design with that but not a big deal. In spite of that, if i could rate this with 10 stars i would!!! **********
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: TV remotes interfere with fan!
customer_reviews.text: You can't use regular tv or cable remote controls around this fan. Pushing the buttons on the remote changes the settings, fan speed and sets the timer. It was the craziest thing, but this fan did not work for us as a result because it was going to be used as a bedside fan for my husband who also likes to watch t.v. at night. It also beeps really loudly with every push of the button (increasing fan speed, peer on/off, etc.) It also looks like there is a camera inside, which I have to admit seemed creepy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish fan that runs quiet and really moves air
customer_reviews.text: Really love this fan. It's small enough to put on a corner of my desk, but moves enough air that it could easily sit on the floor. It pivots and oscillates with 12 fan speeds. At the lower speeds you can barely tell is on. All of this and significantly cheaper than a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Just got it yesterday
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and used it overnight. So far so good! It's real quiet in the house, so we can hear this machine quite clear and it could be a bit more quiet than what it is. We like it so far & we'll come back to the comments section after a few months of using it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Needs Tune up
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great BUT for a hundred bucks I could buy 3 regular fans that compare. One BIG problem is the blue light that stays on when using. I keep the fan on the night stand and light is too BRIGHT. So I bought a rubber keychain and use that to cover the light. On the other had I've used this in hotel rooms which works as a great night light.
customer_reviews.author: Draper

customer_reviews.title: 2 months, won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when it worked ... bought 2 months ago and every time I turn it on, it turns itself off. Tried setting a 5 hour timer. Turned off after 30 seconds. Unfortunately I cannot return as the window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The volume of air moved is a little less than expected. Seems to me the 12 speeds are a bit much. Up to about speed 6 it is fairly quiet. When we took it out of the box the combination of plastic and foam created a vacuum suction. I pulled on to foam top and my wife pulled the box away. When the suction broke, my wife had the box, I had the top foam piece and the fan fell on the floor and broke apart. Got it back together with duct tape. It is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Murray

customer_reviews.title: Made it to the 2yr warranty and completely went out! No warning!
customer_reviews.text: $99 might not seem like alot to some but we have Walmart fans for $25 that have lasted 5yrs +. However this was a birthday gift for my son who is a poor college student. Worked fine till a few months past the 2 year warranty and just stopped working without any warning or problems. Extremely dissatisfied with our new paper weight...for the investment it should have lasted way longer for the so called quality it should have been. Dont waste your money on this product. I also never leave product reviews but felt that I wouldn't want someone else to be this dissatisfied and loose $100 bucks on it either.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Small, but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This fan is powerful. You'll be very happy with the strength of the blast of air and the span of the room it covers. I just moved into a place with no air conditioning and am really receiving relief from this fan. So easy to operate too. Ahhh!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good fan ... but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quiet, powerful bladeless fan for my office but was unwilling to fork over for a Dyson. Bought this one instead. Overall, it does a fine job, but in my judgment it isn't quite as quiet or powerful as others have indicated. The value proposition is probably decent given that it seems to be a much better unit than the cheap fan that it replaced. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Fairbank

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy cheaper fans that would break after a few months and required a lot of cleaning. I have had my GreenTech fan since 2017 and love it! I just bought the second one for my spare room. Amazing product, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: NOT EXACTLY BLADELESS...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two GreenTech Environmental PureFlow QT7. One lasted one year, the second 18 months. I recently dismantled them in an attempt to fix them. The whole inside of the casing was full of dirt and dust, including the fan blades. The electronic circuit boards are also not well connected. The fan is quiet on the lower settings, on the higher, not so much. The remote works (also not for long) within 6 feet of the fan. $99 of fan should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Love the low wattage
customer_reviews.text: This only isolates back & forth, not up and down like their other fan. The up and down tilt is manual. Very quiet. Not as quiet as their standing fan but very quiet nonetheless. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than one year
customer_reviews.text: Should last longer than one year at the least. He didn't even last one year and would not buy again. Sorry to say. I bought this so I wouldn't have to clean fan blades again but I still have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: KristenMarie_H.

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding
customer_reviews.text: Thus fan is great. Small and looks nice a year later no rattles or funny noises. It just works.... we love it
customer_reviews.author: kyle pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to any Room!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fan. It is powerful yet has a quiet, gentle, air flow into the room. The lower numbers are extremely quiet yet it still moves the air way across the room gently. The higher numbers will cool a room down very quickly! We keep it around "3" most of the time to keep the air flowing nicely. No dusty blades to keep clean. I would definitely buy again. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet at level 3 or below...gets noisier on higher settings.
customer_reviews.text: It will be easy to clean. My great-niece thought it was a cute robot. I like the lower settings to boost air circulation since we do not have ceiling fans. It also acts as a white noise (noise canceling) machine to my husband's snoring! The only reason I did not give it a five was the price. I have a small, bladed fan that is just as quiet but a fraction of this price.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Best, most quiet fan I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is, bar none, the best fan of it’s size that I have ever had. I needed a QUIET fan that didn’t take up too much room while successfully moving the air. I have used it for two seasons (spring, summer and fall x 2) and when it wears out, I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rock Suz

customer_reviews.title: Extra cooling was needed
customer_reviews.text: This little fan does it all...bedroom was warm in Arizona. Fan helps to draw the air conditioning around the room and it is used at night. Fairly quiet and does not disturb sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Woullard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fan!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fan to have with children. We recently purchased a second one- for visiting guests. Not only is it attractive, and has multiple speed options, but it is quiet! The best::))
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Died after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these fans from Amazon about 18 months ago. They ARE quiet. One continues to run but the other died. I had hoped for better endurance. :(
customer_reviews.author: WishIknewThisBefore

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & Cooling Fan
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve purchased Works really well, good air flow & oscillation. Does a good job of cooling down a room Excellent product would strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: D Farley

customer_reviews.title: but its more noisy then some other fan I have like Ozeri. At low speed noice is to much
customer_reviews.text: well built , quality product , but its more noisy then some other fan I have like Ozeri. At low speed noice is to much
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh

customer_reviews.title: Not Quiet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice powerful fan but was not quiet enough for me to sleep with it on. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Trax

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my twins' bedroom and it was great at first. It all of a sudden stopped working. The oscillation feature stopped working first and now the fan just won't come on at all unless you "jimmy" it a little. But then it just cuts off again. Not happy with this at all. This fan was not cheap, it should last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great off grid fan
customer_reviews.text: The little fan moves a lot of air, tested wattage at 1.5 amps on level 6, 2 amps on level 12. Blue light is very bright but a small sock covered it up perfectly. Much nicer than a stand fan but we did need to elevate it to be comfortable at night. Great for of grid living in a rain forest. Arrived early. Very happy with Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. COleman

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This fan was great for about 5 months until it started leaking gross oil everywhere. Spending this much on a fan I would expect it to last awhile. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves money
customer_reviews.text: Energy saving great value timer nice no assembly good for anyone in budget uses 2 watts per level recommend for getting cold air from floor up
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Dyson but a good cheap option for the office. It is not silent but definitely a lot quieter than most fans out there. Produces gentle ambient air circulation on setting 3 which I have on all day because my office get stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: Liva

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful as described
customer_reviews.text: The was costly to not provide airflow as I read it would. Blew air like normal fan. Not impressed. Customer service was great !
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Excessively noisy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe acceptable if one is hearing impaired, for the rest of us its noise level is threefold higher compared to traditional fan. New design with regressive results, truly trumpian!
customer_reviews.author: T Calvo

customer_reviews.title: My remote won't work
customer_reviews.text: New battery in the remote on arrival and it doesn't work. Also put a new battery in the remote and it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Headley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: We used it last summer in our bedroom at night. It doesn’t make much noise and it’s working well. I like the fact that you can really control the intensity and that you can do it remotely. Lovely design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fan! quite!
customer_reviews.text: I find it very quite. So quite I don't really hear it at all. It sounds just a little louder than a laptop PC. I run it on the lowest setting though 1. For me, the lowest setting is more than enough of air. I've used it on the lowest setting for a few days now. It makes plenty of breeze from a surprising distance. I aim it a specific 'point' and the fan moves the air at that focal spot from about 10 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: So far the best product for my needs
customer_reviews.text: (Used for all the same reasons others use a fan in the desert !) Air flow is quiet, but if not perfectly level, has noises created by vibration. Am using at half speed which has really good airflow. (any higher setting is louder)
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This fan is quiet when needed and can seriously move air when desired as well. With the 12 different speeds and the ability to adjust air flow vertically/manually along with the horizontal oscillation it is well made, tiny and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: kcsintl

customer_reviews.title: It is very compact and cool looking, about the size of a bowling ball
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very, very quiet but puts out alot of air even on the lowest settings. It is very compact and cool looking, about the size of a bowling ball. Love the remote function too. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: BEST FAN EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Love!!!Love!!!💗💗💗My new fan! So quiet and remote is extra convenient. Love that it is so convenient to move from room to room when necessary. I do have central AC in my home but I like to place my new so quiet fan in front of AC vents to conveniently move air around! Makes it SOOOO!!! much cooler! At night I place the fan in my room facing the bed with the AC off. So nice to be able to sleep 💤 comfortably with such a quiet fan!
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet and is powerful at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: This puts off cool air. The sound is similar to white noise. It's actually very relaxing. I bought these for therapists offices at my work and then ended up buying one for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as a dyson fan
customer_reviews.text: I have a skittish dog. Last summer bought a dyson fan that was very quiet. This fan can only be used at the second lowest setting. It still moves enough air to keep. Price was more than half what a dyson costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Quiet and powerful! I initially thought I would not like its look, and how large it is, but it doesn't bother me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal_Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fan, I named mine Eva from the movie Wall-E. On low settings you can’t even hear it. On the highest setting, the noise it makes puts you to sleep. Very powerful little fan.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 summers and at first it did not oscillate and I continued to use it. Now it stops working after about 20 minutes. I can't believe I spent $ for this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Lapetino

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids since it's bladeless
customer_reviews.text: This is so quiet and so strong! Great for kids since it's bladeless. My kids thought it's the death star and kept playing with it though... Will think about getting another one for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Lycheeice

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing ever! It’s so quiet and smooth! I can’t sleep without it! This is the 2nd one I’ve purchased cuz my kids took the other one! It is perfect! I wish i had one in every room!
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Pureflow Fan
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a week or so, but it seems to put out a lot of air. It is very quiet, I can't even say I hear anything from it when its on. So far I like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Staffieri

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new fan. It is quiet when it is in the lower numbers, but still quieter than most. I like having the remote. It came like it was suppose to. I really like it. I've only had it for a week, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J  Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it didn't. Bought it for my daughter last year. It worked great for a month or so. She didn't bother to tell me it stopped working. Excessively disappointed as it was a nice fan (and not cheap).
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The fan airflow is a bit direct and small, but the fan oscillates, so it spreads around the room pretty well. The remote didn't work at first, but the company had great customer service and replaced it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JB W.

customer_reviews.title: Great with just one tiny thing...
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, even bought another one. The only issue and it's minor is I wish I could silence the beep it has when you use the remote. Not always ideal at night to have beeping going on. Other than that, great unit!
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a quiet fan this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is exceptionally quiet run at speed settings 1-5. After that it gets a little louder. It's a little bigger than I expected and I knocked off one star because it only tilts from horizontal to upwards. If you want something that tilts down this isn't it. Otherwise, highly recommended if you're looking for an exceptionally quiet fan for a smallish room.
customer_reviews.author: D Williams

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The fan was a little bigger than expected but you know what, it works great and is much quieter than another "whisper quiet" fan I got. I love how it comes with a remote and oscillates.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Moeykens

customer_reviews.title: Is this a durable unit?
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product Just had under 2 months and it just stopped working Kept shutting off over the past few days Now it’s just not turning on Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: zero

customer_reviews.title: It cools you off fast.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fan at night I get hot and the remote control is by my bed so I can turn the fan on. The fan was a little bigger than it look in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

product_meta.title: GreenTech Environmental PureFlow QT7 - Bladeless Quiet RC Oscillating Table Fan
feature_bullets: ADJUST & OSCILLATE - Circulate air throughout the entire room with its unique 90 Vertical Tilt and 90 Horizontal Oscillation, keeping the air flowing in every direction. 8 Foot long cord.
POWERFUL AIRFLOW - Uniquely designed to cycle air more quickly than traditional fans, keeping your room temperature consistent and comfortable.

ENERGY EFFICIENT - Everything about this fan is designed to reduce power usage and increase airflow. Using as little as 2 Watts it can provide twice the circulation speed and coverage of a normal fan.
SAFETY-FIRST DESIGN - Provides a safe alternative to traditional bladed fans because of its bladeless cooling design, allowing for use around children and pets.
12 FAN SPEEDS - Customize your comfort with 12 individual fan speed settings, offering airflow from a gentle breeze to a full gust of wind and everything in between.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars670 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
